solution.text:
Given that tan_{j}_A = cot(_{k}_A-_{l}_)
Now write tan_{j}_A as cot (90-_{j}_A)
compare the angle on both sides
90-_{j}_A = _{k}_A-_{l}_
bring _{l}_ on left side and _{j}_A on right side
which gives 90+_{l}_ = _{k}_A+_{j}_A
taking A out on right side
90+_{l}_ = A(_{k}_+_{j}_)
finally which will give value of A as:
A = \((90+_{l}_)\over (_{k}_+_{j}_)\)
A = \(_{{90+l}}_\over _{{k+j}}_\)

content.text:
Determine the value of A
if tan_{j}_A = cot(_{k}_A-_{l}_)
considering that _{j}_A is an acute angle
